verses.name: Deuteronomy 28:15
verses.text: But it shall come to pass, if thou wilt not hearken unto the voice of the Lord thy God, to observe to do all his commandments and his statutes which I command thee this day; that all these curses shall come upon thee, and overtake thee:

verses.name: Deuteronomy 28:16
verses.text: Cursed shalt thou be in the city, and cursed shalt thou be in the field.

verses.name: Deuteronomy 28:17
verses.text: Cursed shall be thy basket and thy store.

verses.name: Deuteronomy 28:18
verses.text: Cursed shall be the fruit of thy body, and the fruit of thy land, the increase of thy kine, and the flocks of thy sheep.
